outputs.output_descr: This project, with key project objective "To strengthen protected areas' sustainability in Gansu Province through improved effectiveness of PA management and sustainable financing" will overcome the barriers mentioned above through a series of interventions at the provincial level and demonstration work at Tao He region within the province.

project_descr: GEF PIMS 4072 BD PPG:Strengthening globally important biodiversity conservation through protected area strengthening in Gansu Province
project_title: Strengthening Protected Area in Gansu Province
